title: Glen Canyon National Recreation Area: Grand Canyon Monitoring and Research Center
body: Grand Canyon Monitoring and Research Center       The Grand Canyon Monitoring and Research Center (GCMRC) has researchers who study Lake Powell to determine the effects of the operation of Glen Canyon Dam on the Colorado River through the Grand Canyon. Water quality monitoring is conducted monthly near the dam and quarterly throughout the main channel, San Juan channel, and the Escalante channel of Lake Powell.
